#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<bitset>
#include<deque>
#include<queue>
#include<string>
#include<map>
#include<cstring>
#include<sstream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int T;
	scanf("%d", &T);
	for (int t = 0; t < T; t++)
	{
		int N;
		scanf("%d", &N);
		int arr[N];
		scanf("%d", &arr[0]);
		int min = arr[0];
		long long sum = (long long)arr[0];
		for (int i = 1; i < N; i++)
		{
			scanf("%d", &arr[i]);
			sum += (long long)arr[i];
			int div = (int)(sum/((long long)(i+1)));
			if (div < min)
				min = div;
		}
		printf("%d\n", min);
	}
	return 0;
}
